name: Comedy Genre
description: Humorous and lighthearted content with comedic timing, exaggerated expressions, and playful scenarios

prompt.base: Comedy style, bright and vibrant colors, exaggerated expressions, playful composition, energetic atmosphere, comedic timing, lighthearted mood, dynamic framing
prompt.positive: bright lighting, vibrant colors, expressive faces, comedic gestures, playful energy, dynamic poses, humorous situations, cheerful atmosphere, animated expressions, comedic timing, visual gags, lighthearted mood
prompt.negative: dark mood, serious tone, dramatic lighting, muted colors, sad expressions, tragic elements, horror elements, violence, grim atmosphere

technical.color_palette: Bright, saturated colors with high contrast
technical.lighting: Bright, even lighting with minimal shadows
technical.composition: Wide shots for physical comedy, close-ups for reactions

variations.name: Slapstick Comedy
variations.modifier: physical comedy, exaggerated movements, cartoon-like expressions, fast-paced action, visual humor

variations.name: Romantic Comedy
variations.modifier: charming atmosphere, warm colors, soft lighting, chemistry between characters, playful interactions

variations.name: Dark Comedy
variations.modifier: ironic situations, subtle humor, muted colors with bright accents, deadpan expressions, absurd scenarios

examples: A character with an exaggerated surprised expression, bright colorful background, dynamic pose, comedic timing captured mid-action
Two characters in a humorous misunderstanding, bright lighting, expressive body language, playful composition
